T01D1179:258a-1: dpal ldan bzang po'i chos kyi legs par grags pa'i gsung //
T01D1179:258a-2: rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sras po bde bar gshegs pa'i sku //
T01D1179:258a-3: 'jig rten gsum spyan srid gsum sgron me gcig pu pa //
T01D1179:258a-4: ye shes rab tu grub la brtson pas phyag bgyi'o //
T01D1179:258a-5: thugs rje'i 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa can //
T01D1179:258a-6: rnam par 'dren pa dran mkhyen bde ba'i go 'phang gnas //
T01D1179:258a-7: srid par gcig tu gzhan gyi don la nges par 'byung //
T01D1179:258a-8: sgrol dka' sgrol ba de nyid kho nar phyag bgyi'o //
T01D1179:258a-9: sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su rig cing rab mchog
T01D1179:258a-10: yon tan tshogs kyis brgyan pas sku ni rab tu
T01D1179:258a-11: mdzes // ye shes rgyan dang lhab lhub dang ldan
T01D1179:258a-12: rgya chen brtse ldan ma 'ongs rjes su rigs dang
T01D1179:258a-13: mdzes // bcas // sems can don dang theg gsum
T01D1179:258a-14: gcig pa'i ye shes chu yis skye bo mtha' dag
T01D1179:258a-16: sh'akya'i sras po bde gshegs sku yi yon tan mnga' ba ye shes phung po de la phyag bgyi'o //
T01D1179:258a-17: sa dang pha rol phyin dang dge ba rab mchog bcu po thams cad kyis //
T01D1179:258a-18: gang zhig nye bar rgyas byas bsod nams tshogs kyi pha rol son //
T01D1179:258a-19: stobs bcu'i yon tan brnyes pas tshogs kyi mthar son pa //
T01D1179:258a-20: srid dang srid bral rgya mtsho sgrol mdzad de la phyag bgyi'o //
T01D1179:258a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang
T01D1179:258a-22: bsod nams kyi tshogs dang sa dang pha rol tu
T01D1179:258a-23: phyin pas gang ba bla ma dam pa mchog gi
T01D1179:258a-24: man ngag gi dam pa'i chos kyi rnga bo che
T01D1179:258a-25: rigs pa dang rnam par bkra ba'i tshig gis brgyan
T01D1179:258a-26: pa sangs rgyas kyi myu gu byang chub sems dpa'i
T01D1179:258a-27: mtshan can grags pa bzang po dang thugs rje dang
T01D1179:258a-28: ye shes kyi bdud rtsi bsil ba can tshogs thams
T01D1179:258a-29: cad kyi pha rol tu son pa la bstod pa
T01D1179:258a-30: / lha'i yul mthar gnas pa'i sh'akya'i dge slong dge
T01D1179:258a-31: legs dpal mgon gyis gsol ba btab ste ha ri
T01D1179:258a-32: pu nydza'i yul gyi sh'akya'i dge slong chos kyi nyi
T01D1179:258a-33: ma zhes bya bas rnam par bkra bar bkod pa
T01D1179:258a-34: mgo bo la thob po zhes /
T01D1179:258a-35: bdag dang 'gro ba rnams la dge bar gyur cig / bdag gi bsod nams las 'di yis //
T01D1179:258a-36: ma 'ongs sangs rgyas nyid gyur te //
T01D1179:258a-37: 'khor bar sdug bsngal sems can rnams //
